name: New Bremen
summary:
Computer game on the continuation of the famous animated series about the adventures of Troubadour and his friends - the cartoon "New Bremen". 
 
The fairy kingdom has changed since the times when famous Bremen musicians lived in it. Our hero - a private detective, gets the job from the robbers to take away the crown from the king himself. Faced with deceit, the famous Detective repents aiding the robbers and, together with the musicians of Bremen, helps the king find his grandson and take the crown from the evil robbers. The plot full of humor is worthy of the level of a modern detective story, a mixture of love, everyday and political intrigues at the level of the royal court. The disc has a lot of music and songs performed by popular pop singers. The game has no age restrictions and is recommended to everyone without exception.
